text: orearra sattayil ninn tanne ninnale srsticcuntakkiyavananavan. atil ninn tanne atinre inayeyum avanuntakki. avaleateatt avan samadhanamatayuvan venti. annane avan avale prapiccappeal aval laghuvaya oru (garbha) bharam vahiccu. ennitt avalatumayi natannu. tutarnn avalkk bharam kutiyappeal avar iruvarum avarute raksitavaya allahuveat prart'thiccu. nannalkku ni oru nalla santanatte tarikayanenkil tirccayayum nannal nandiyullavarute kuttattilayirikkum
